name: Birbectronic
description:
Shooter I made from scratch for the Godot Game-Jam june 2018
This game is made with GodotEngine v3.0 https://godotengine.org/

You control a Mercha Birb, and need to kill all the that invaded the world!

Manage the temperature of the Birb to deal more damage with causing malfunctions,

can you succeed?

Read the code at: https://github.com/GodRabbit/Birbectronic

<note: project been updated after submission due to bug the prevent winning the game, sorry for the inconvenient?
